dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://super-golf-tips.com/beginner.shtml

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:
From: 	[private]@google.com
To: 	[private]@fjpmarketing.com
Date: 	Wed, 17 Oct 2007 11:42:11 -0700
Local: 	Wed, Oct 17 2007 11:42 am
Duration: 	10:26 minutes
Subject: 	Re: [#203495825] notice of infringement
Hi [private],

We have received your DMCA complaint dated 9/28/2007. We are currently
reviewing the complaint in relation to (1) copyrighted
page: http://www.learnaboutgolf.com/beginner/beginner.html. and (1)
allegedly infringing page: http://super-golf-tips.com/beginner.shtml, only.


However, we were unable to find the allegedly infringing material on the
URL listed as:

"The offending web pages by super-golf-tips.com
are: http://super-golf-tips.com/golftip.shtml (containing the same
list of golf lessons) as well as subsequent pages displaying my golf
lessons, a total of 25."

Please note that the allegedly infringing material must appear on the
exact URL listed. Additionally, all subsequent sub-pages must EACH be
listed individually in order for us to process your request.

We will contact you when we have completed processing the request. We
appreciate your patience during this process.Please note that a copy of
each legal notice we receive is sent to a third-party partner for
publication and annotation. As such, your letter (with your personal
information removed) will be forwarded to Chilling Effects
( http://www.chillingeffects.org ) for publication. You can see an example
of such a publication at
http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/notice.cgi?NoticeID=861. A link to
your published letter will be displayed in Google's search results in
place of the removed content.


Regards,
The Google Team

Original Message Follows:
------------------------
From: [private]@fjpmarketing.com
Subject: notice of infringement
Date: Fri, 28 Sep 2007 04:19:51 -0400

To
Google, Inc.
Attn: AdSense Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View CA [private]

September 28, 2007

RE: Copyright infringement by ?www. super-golf-tips.com?


Dear Sir/Madam,

I?d like to bring to your attention the infringement of my copyright
by the website ?super-golf-tips.com?.

1. My own web pages containing the original material are:
http://www.learnaboutgolf.com/beginner/lessons.html (which contains a
list of golf lessons) and 25 subsequent pages containing the
individual golf lessons.

The offending web pages by super-golf-tips.com
are: http://super-golf-tips.com/golftip.shtml (containing the same
list of golf lessons) as well as subsequent pages displaying my golf
lessons, a total of 25.

2. My own web page containing the original material is:
http://www.learnaboutgolf.com/beginner/beginner.html.

The offending web pages by super-golf-tips.com is
http://super-golf-tips.com/beginner.shtml


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

For your necessary action, please.

With best regards,


Dr [private], Ph.D.
Principal, FJP Marketing LLP
www.FJPMarketing.com
